name: Tumblr - Doctor Who "Bad Wolf" logo
description: "badwolf." to replace the Tumblr logo on your dashboard!

user.name: GeekintheJeep
user.about:
A 24-year old geek who happens to have inadvertently stumbled into this Tumblr editing stuff.

Contact me here or on Tumblr (GeekintheJeep) with any questions or requests!

additional_info: Tested on Firefox only. Please let me know on Tumblr (GeekintheJeep) with any possible alignment issues, questions, or requests! I hope I'm not stepping on any toes by making this when there are other similar versions available. I couldn't find any others that kept an actual link to the Tumblr dashboard in the logo, so I made one myself.
